checkMove: Allow only PebbleProj, allow push or bump (only bump from player when open)
Allow only Coconut, depending on state allow all
notifyMove: State change: close, delete Coconut, allow all if in closed state

notifyMove: Do push, or on pebble: If not in line with direction, delete and place in next tile in redirected direction
